title: Requirements Gathering and Analysis
description: Understand the project requirements, gather business needs, and analyze technical feasibility.

title: Define Project Scope and Goals
description: Formulate clear project scope, goals, and expectations based on the requirements gathered.

title: Design System Architecture
description: Create a high-level architecture design for the system, including database structure, APIs, and frontend/backend components.

title: Develop Glossary Management Interface
description: Design and implement the frontend interface for creating, editing, and managing personalized glossaries.

title: Implement Backend Services and API
description: Develop the backend services and APIs required for glossary management, translation services, and system integration.

title: Integrate with Translation Services
description: Connect the system with third-party translation services or implement custom translation solutions.

title: Create Unit Tests for Core Functionality
description: Write unit tests to validate the correctness and consistency of core functionality.

title: Perform Security Audit
description: Conduct a security audit to identify potential vulnerabilities and ensure the system follows best practices.

title: Deploy System for Initial Testing
description: Prepare the system for deployment, deploy it to a staging environment for initial testing.
dependencies: Create Unit Tests for Core Functionality

title: Iterate Based on Test Results and Feedback
description: Address any issues or concerns raised during testing, iterate on the system design if necessary.

title: Prepare Documentation and Training Materials
description: Create documentation and training materials to support users in utilizing the system effectively.
dependencies: Iterate Based on Test Results and Feedback
